settings.heading: Our Cleaning Services
settings.subheading: Professional cleaning services tailored to your needs. From weekly maintenance to deep cleans and special projects.

settings.title: House & Apartment Cleaning
settings.description: Regular weekly or bi-weekly cleaning for your home. Includes all standard cleaning tasks to keep your space spotless.

settings.title: Move In/Out Cleaning
settings.description: Deep cleaning for moving transitions. Perfect for landlords, tenants, and new homeowners.

settings.title: Deep Cleaning
settings.description: Comprehensive top-to-bottom cleaning. Perfect for first-time service or seasonal deep cleans.

settings.title: Window Cleaning
settings.description: Interior and exterior window cleaning for crystal-clear views.

settings.title: Commercial Cleaning
settings.description: Professional office and commercial space cleaning. Regular or one-time service available.

settings.title: Post-Construction Cleanup
settings.description: Specialized cleaning after construction or renovation projects.

settings.title: Holiday Cleanup
settings.description: Pre and post-holiday cleaning services. Get ready for guests or clean up after celebrations.

settings.title: Add-on Services
settings.description: Laundry, organizing, decluttering, and other specialty services to complement your cleaning.

settings.heading: OUR CLEANING SERVICES
settings.subheading: Tailored solutions for homes, offices, move-outs & more.
